mapper.insert: insert into WarehouseOut (id, orderId, goodsId, qty, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
